messages.title: Brexit done. Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.
messages.content: The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I've been just as frustrated as you. We've had three years of a hung parliament that agrees on nothing except more arguments. But we don't have to go on like this. Together, we can end the doom and gloom.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we leave the EU by the end of January and it means we can get on with the country’s priorities.
£33 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GP can give you the healthcare you need.
20,000 extra police officers. With the powers and back-up they need to keep us safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
And a growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal – which is agreed and ready to go from day one. It protects jobs and trade. It means we leave the EU by the end of January and it means we can get on with the country’s priorities.
issues.economy: And a growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
issues.governance: The country needs a majority government. And you can secure it with your postal vote.
issues.health: £33 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GP can give you the healthcare you need.

contactInformation.address: Room A16, The Whitehouse, 55 Blenheim Terrace, Leeds, LS2 9AE

endorsements.endorsement: I am asking you to use your postal vote for Andrea Jenkyns in Morley & Outwood. Let's end the delays. Let's get Brexit done with our deal. And let's unleash Britain's potential.

quotes.text: Britain has spent too long going nowhere, spinning round in a hamster wheel of doom. That's why your role in this election is a huge one. Because you can get us out of it.

images.caption: A campaign leaflet with text addressed by Rt Hon Boris Johnson, encouraging support for Andrea Jenkyns.
